### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5))

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill and a furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)
-  Burner inserter at position(60.5, -61.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  Assembling machine (no position available)
-  Inserter (no position available) that puts into assembling machine
-  Belt group (no position available) that connects the furnace to assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using boiler or steam engine
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel to operate correctly
- Ensure that the steam engine has input liquid and fluid present in connections to operate correctly
- Ensure that the boiler and steam engine are connected correctly

### Errors when refueling the boiler
- Ensure that there is coal in the inventory to refuel the boiler

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
* Inventory: {'transport-belt': 8, 'small-electric-pole': 1, 'pipe': 20, 'stone-furnace': 1, 'wood': 7, 'copper-ore': 20, 'iron-plate': 613, 'copper-plate': 5, 'copper-cable': 2, 'iron-gear-wheel': 2} (type: dictionary)
